content: Hm? The spatial density in the Ecohouse seems... <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I have something of utmost importance to discuss with you.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: The Ecohouse has now... {A抱歉}run out of space to accommodate more organisms.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: However... please don't worry! I once envisioned a grand structure that could house, study, and showcase everything. Behold...
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II
筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: The entire structure costs a mere 1,000,000,000 Dough. That's just one extra zero compared to the Ecohouse. Now that's...{短暂停} a great bargain.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: Funding was never the real obstacle when it came to building this facility. The real problem has always been the lack of enough living specimens to keep the entire system running.{A灵光一现} I never expected...
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: Thanks to your help, my wish has finally come true. <style=Highlight>Tomorrow</style>{A拍手} will be the grand opening of the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style>.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: Well then, I look forward to your presence at tomorrow's opening ceremony of the Omni-Gallery.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II
筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: Don't tell me the Ecohouse is packed to the brim?!
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: {A一愣}How perceptive... Just what I'd expect from you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>!
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II

content: Until then, please feel free to <style=Highlight>keep bringing creatures to me to be settled</style>.
info: 筹建万象馆-墨尔斯_主流程文本II
